mapper.select: SELECT member_no as likeMember, like_yn as likeYn FROM like_reply WHERE 1=1 AND member_no = #{memberNo} AND rcd = #{rcd} AND use_yn = 'Y'
SELECT member_no as hateMember, hate_yn as hateYn FROM hate_reply WHERE 1=1 AND member_no = #{memberNo} AND rcd = #{rcd} AND use_yn = 'Y'

SELECT r.like_cnt as likeCnt , r.hate_cnt as hateCnt , l.member_no as likeMember , l.like_yn as likeYn FROM reply r INNER JOIN like_reply l ON r.rcd = l.rcd WHERE 1=1 AND l.use_yn = 'Y' AND l.rcd = #{rcd} AND l.member_no = #{memberNo}
AND l.like_no = #{likeNo}

SELECT r.like_cnt as likeCnt , r.hate_cnt as hateCnt , h.member_no as hateMember , h.hate_yn as hateYn FROM reply r INNER JOIN hate_reply h ON r.rcd = h.rcd WHERE 1=1 AND h.use_yn = 'Y' AND h.rcd = #{rcd} AND h.member_no = #{memberNo}
AND h.hate_no = #{hateNo}
SELECT ifnull(max(rno), 0) as rno FROM reply WHERE bno = #{bno}
mapper.update: UPDATE reply SET use_yn = 'N', del_yn = 'Y', update_dt = SYSDATE() WHERE rcd = #{rcd}
UPDATE like_reply SET use_yn = 'N', del_yn = 'Y', update_dt = SYSDATE() WHERE rcd = #{rcd}
UPDATE hate_reply SET use_yn = 'N', del_yn = 'Y', update_dt = SYSDATE() WHERE rcd = #{rcd}
UPDATE reply SET reply_text = #{replyText}, update_yn = 'Y', update_dt = SYSDATE() WHERE rcd = #{rcd}
